alert.note: Alert for Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:41PM EDT until July 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR SCOTLAND AND SOUTHEASTERN RICHMOND COUNTIES... At 541 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamlet, or 8 miles southeast of Rockingham, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Laurinburg, Hamlet, Wagram, Gibson, East Laurinburg, Laurel Hill, Camp Mackall and Sandhills Game Land. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
